title: Sandi Toksvig is leaving GBBO
text:
View this post on Instagram

Good double acts are a rare and magical beast ! I’m gonna miss Sandi comically and personally but i also know we were lucky to have her for 3 amazing years ! wish you all the best in your next adventures x x love Noel x
meta_description: Sandi Toksvig is leaving The Great British Bake Off to pursue other projects. She will participate in The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up To Cancer in the spring. Her official announcement: https://t.co/UrrKin8a6u pic.twitter.com/LsFDqzoDjs  Sandi Toksvig (@sanditoksvig) January 16,…
